Englisch
The eleven year old cycling talent Freddy is the son of a butcher in an idyllic village in no
man's land. His isolated life is turned upside down completely in 1975 when the first
supermarket in the village opens its doors. To mark the opening the supermarket organizes a
cycling race and the winner of that match will meet Eddy Merckx. Freddy's father is a
fervent opponent of the supermarket and the competition, but Freddy subscribes behind his
back. By participating in the race a new world opens, not only for Freddy, but also for all
those around him.
